content: TE-SX SW Pointed wall chisels Extra-sharp TE-S pointed wall chisels for demolishing concrete and masonry walls ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Extra-sharp tip – engineered to penetrate faster when demolishing walls Easier resharpening – the induction-hardened, high alloy steel can be sharpened using an angle grinder Optimized for wall demolition – shorter shanks make these chisels a more efficient and comfortable solution for breaking up concrete walls Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these chisels especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Applications Demolishing concrete, brick or block walls Creating shallow recesses at any position within the wall For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Length: 11.8 in Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Length | 11.8 in | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2104282 - Pointed wall chisel TE-SX SW 30 - Package Size 1 pc
